file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-14-01-06 - MAIN DOOR DRAIN VALVES - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN DOOR DRAIN VALVES - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. The procedures given in this section are applicable to the inspection of the main door drains. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MAIN DOOR DRAINS - INSPECTION/ ALL 52-14-01-200-801-A CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-14-01 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-14-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN DOOR DRAINS - INSPECTION/CHECK A. General (1) There are three drain valves installed in the main door skin. Refer to Figure 601. (2) The main door drain valves are made in rubber. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - SRM 51-40-02/PR - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 - Main Door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Screwdriver To remove/install the drain valve available Commercially Wiper cloth To dry the drain valves available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) Commercially available Neutral liquid detergent AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Outside the aircraft EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-14-01 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-A (1) Open the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). (2) Remove the main-door lining panels ( AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400). (3) Remove the main door thermoacoustic insulation, only to get access to the drain holes and valves (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400). J. Detailed Inspection on Main-Door Drain Valves for Obstruction or Damage (Figure 601) SUBTASK 220-008-A (1) Pour water into the drain valves from the internal side of the door. Refer to Figure 601; Sheet 1. (2) From the external side, make sure that water flows through the drain valves. (3) If there is water flow, dry the wet region with a wiper cloth. (4) If there is no water flow in a drain, do as follows: (a) For screwed drain valves: 1 Remove the screws (5), nuts (1), and washers (2) of the three drain valves as shown in Figure 601; Sheet 2. 2 Remove the washers (3) and the drain valves (4) from the main door. 3 Lightly rub the surfaces of the main door drain valves with a soft cloth soaked in neutral detergent and clean with water. 4 Install the three drain valves with the washers, nuts, and screws on the main door. (b) For riveted drain valves: 1 Remove the rivets. Refer to SRM 51-40-02/PR. Then, remove the drain valves (4) from the main door. 2 Lightly rub the surfaces of the main-door drain valves with a soft cloth soaked in neutral detergent and clean with water. 3 Install the rivets. Refer to SRM 51-40-02/PR. K. Inspection on Main-Door Drain Holes for Obstruction (Figure 602) SUBTASK 220-009-A (1) Do a visual check on the drain holes for clogging. (2) If the drain holes are clogged, remove the dirty material and clean the region with a wiper cloth. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-14-01 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL L. Inspection on Lock-Box Drain Holes for Obstruction (Figure 602) SUBTASK 220-010-A (1) Do a visual check on the lock-box drain holes for clogging. (2) If the drain holes are clogged, remove the dirt from the drain holes with a thin wire and from the lock box with compressed air. M. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-A (1) Install the main-door lining panels ( AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400). (2) Close the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). (3) Install the main-door thermoacoustic insulation (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-14-01 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
